extendedInfo.description: Incredible live wallpaper of zombies hanging by the neck that you can control moving  your phone from side to another.THE ZOMBIES REACT TO MOVEMENT !!!If you're a fan of shows like Walking Dead, zombies and apocalypse movies about games like Left 4 Dead this is notdoubt your application.Download the FULL version to access the settings and remove advertising.FULL VERSION:* Choose lightning show* Option battery saving* Choose from between zombies* Choose from between graveyard backgroundsENJOY!Tags: Walking, zombies, L4D, Dead, graveyard, live wallpaper

reviews.title: Twisted, and cool
reviews.comment: Nice live wallpaper for zombie lovers.  Hang a zombie on your phone and show them that you care. Bottom line, it\'s cool.  Get it
reviews.author: Steven Brand
